snippet.description: * The best guide to nightlife & stag do's in Berlin (clueweb12-0705wb-84-26740) http://www.vamostravel.com/city_breaks/berlin/nightlife.asp ...Its a great place to find a non-stop party spirit, great for those Berlin stag nights and meet a friendly crowd on the dancefloor. A-lounge is another popular bar-club with its on DJ & dancefloor, found in the Mitte district. The music policy changes throughout the week, but the clientele is usually a nice mix of locals, short break foreigners and trendy students. Green Door bar is known to be one of the nicest bars to try... [cached version]
